author: .paulharris
content: i guess we've got a lot of these scenarios... like invalid indexes in attester duties

author: .paulharris
content: as a general rule i like the theory of returning the key requested with the empty result, so that the round trip is more symmetrical

author: .paulharris
content: makes it easier to reconcile that the request was received and there was nothing to report

author: .paulharris
content: i do have to admit i did swallow invalid indexes in preference to returning an invalid key though for attester duties
